entries: Pollen and poison spores spray from your relic, dealing {@damage 1d6} poison damage for every 2 relic levels (minimum {@damage 1d6}) to all creatures in a 15-foot cone (basic Fortitude save). On a critical failure, targets are also {@condition dazzled} for 1 round. You can't use Pollen Spray again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
